name: sipgate-browser-phone
description: Make and receive calls in your browser
author: Marcus Hunger

scripts.build-chrome-extension: npm run-script compile-jsx && zip extension.zip *.html *.js *.png *.gif manifest.json  generated-jsx/*.js -r node_modules/jssip/dist/ -r node_modules/react/dist/ -r node_modules/react-dom/dist/  node_modules/requirejs/require.js node_modules/materialize-css/dist/css/materialize.min.css node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/materialize-css/dist/js/materialize.min.js
